NO MAS SERVIDORES DE MONOS BRASILEÑOS HIJOS DE LA PERRA 
EL KILLER CON 2 DE MS EL MACACO Y EL RESTO DE JUGADORES CON 140 DE PING

这应该是我第一次给一个游戏差评。
不是很懂为什么我已经等对面交钢筋了还是判定没砍到，而且还掉两层擦刀，过分了
退出界面一看原来我的所有屠夫都变成小丑了，那没事了
最近几个版本人类加强的全是游戏机制上的问题，屠夫加强的全是不痛不痒的配件，实际强度基本没有变化,游戏平衡组真的太懂了。
幻神凛被砍成残废，人类泛用技能从不挨刀，咬根变成绝对哑巴，钢筋由于机制的改变也算增强，怀表改了等于没改，打击算是大削，但依旧强力
恩赐图腾被踩灭了还能继续附魔，屠夫厄咒炸了整局技能-1,就算是这样也有一堆人喊着人类单排好难玩
对的，屠夫一直都是你游的陪玩，永世不得翻身是吧，人类已经强势多少个版本了，屠夫只能守二阶打针对才能勉强玩得下去，出去却被人类大爷骂camper。
this game is kind of shit only played a little bit does anyone know how to run bc ive had trouble on that

Dead by Daylight é um jogo terror/sobrevivência assíncrono onde 4 sobreviventes jogam contra 1 assassino, tendo objetivo de escapar do mundo da entidade ao reparar 5 geradores no mapa e abrir o portão (ou achar a escotilha). Já o assassino deve enganchar os sobreviventes para ir eliminando-os.
O jogo se torna divertido justamente pela trabalho de equipe necessário para escapar, ou a sagacidade de conseguir matar os sobreviventes antes que eles consigam escapar, tudo isso recheado de perks, personagens com skills diferentes e uma árvore de skills e itens que vão sendo adquiridos a medida que se consegue ponto de sangue.
No início o jogo pode ser um pouco difícil, mas depois que pega o jeito você fica extremamente viciado.
Só cuidado com a toxicidade de alguns players, que assim como na maioria dos jogos multiplayer, tentam estragar a experiência do jogo com xingamentos e atitudes antidesportivas.
Still so good after so many years. Always a good game to come back to.
Dead By Daylight pode ser estressante as vezes, mas eu simplesmente amo esse jogo <3
"Una maldición ah caído sobre ti, será tu ruina"
Интересный геймплей. Прекрасное комъюнити. Лучшие тиммейты. Всего этого вы здесь не увидите. Весело конечно

A really fun game to play with friends. If you don't have anyone to play with, this game is still tons of fun! All of the survivors and killers add great depth to the game. It will allow you to have a unique game every time. Truly one of my favorites and love the developer attention. All Love!

Con amigos es la leche y sobretodo si los vendes para sobrevivir, hay asesinos camperos pero aun así le darás muchas horas.
yo le pondría un 9/10

Pathetic, degenerate-filled experience with a fundamentally brainless community that goes cuckoo after their meta perks got nerfed, and now DC every single time when they can't loop killer for the entirety of the match because of a perk that grants you a god-like immunity. If you're one of that players just take a good look at yourself to see a miserable man that ruins others' important time. Good night.

If you like frustration, and having fun this is the game for you. There's satisfaction in every action completed either as killer or survivor, but really we all know you'll get called a toxic piece of garbage either way so may as well have the most fun you can with it.
Highly recommended for those who enjoy hearing people scream.
玩了四年才慢慢发现这个游戏的乐趣，原来玩逃生者就想着一个人摸钥匙找地道直接开溜，现在觉得能带领队友一同逃生并想尽办法折磨屠夫才更有意思。当你只顾着自己的时候，常常会处于高度紧张的状态而失误，当你想着与伙伴配合的时候，往往会处于放松的状态而体验到游戏带来的乐趣。这就是我对这个游戏的看法从一个恐怖类转为娱乐类的原因吧。

Tem sempre atualização/dlc, o preço é acessível e o jogo é mto bom. 
Viciante, porém, ao mesmo tempo que te relaxa, te estressa.. rsrs..
every time i exit this game for the day i have a thin film of sweat and salt dried on my body that i have to scrape off

It's Behavior; I don't expect balanced games. I only suffer this game due to my friend wanting me to play it. Killers who are actually good at the game can just easily face camp you after hooking the player; they don't care about pips they just want to ruin someones day. 
I haven't and won't go over all the issues in this game. I'll just say behavior has a way of making it's community toxic; you'll keep playing until you turn into the same campy, tunneling killers that you swore you hated.
Joga merda, só me faz tiltar e nunca corrigem os bugs coco

Значит наиграв всего лишь 400 часов в этой помойке, могу выделить минусы и плюсы.

МИНУСЫ:
-я столкнулся с проблемой, что мне нужен новый кейкап для ctrl
-как же не покрутить камерой с сенсой 1334877328 когда на скилле распилил за буббу, поэтому кисть тоже устает
-иногда какие-то неведомые силы просто не дают мне зайти в игру (возможно стоило это отнести к плюсам)))
-в игре есть читеры, но встречаются редко
-i think we do a pretty good job so far

ПЛЮСЫ!!!:
-хорошее и доброе комьюнити))))))))
-это приятное ощущение, когда пробегал маньяка всю игру (если ты любишь стелс, земля тебе металлом)
-клево играть с друзьями, а если вас еще и 5, и вы играете в приватку, то веселья будет хоть отбавляй (не забудьте взять ноед))))))) шучу, пожалейте друзей
-твоя первая встреча с маньяком, закончится тем, что ты сможешь построить новый дом, съедешь от родителей наконец))
-кто бы что ни говорил, но игра лучшая в своем жанре)

И да, слабые игроки буду гореть с того, что их кемпят или туннелят (фейскемп осуждаю) маньякам же тоже нужно как-то выигрывать, он 1, а вас 4. И если ты упал, то это твои проблемы)

This game is fun at time, but when it's not fun, it really stings.  It's up to the killer to decide how much fun the survivors can have and this really shouldn't be the case as there are a lot of very toxic people in this game that just make the game not fun.
Although I do recommend this game, I wouldn't recommend you choose it to be your main game, because the more and more time you sink into it, the more and more you see the flaws in design and balancing.  This would be a very good game if there was a large amount of balancing done to make the survivors and killers even.  The perk "No One Escapes Death" for killers and "Decisive Strike" for survivors make the game unbalanced and unpolished for both sides, and although they make new characters with new perks and all that, they don't get used half the time and the same meta remains (most of the time).  

Overall TL;DR: Fun as a party game with your friends for like a few hours, don't sink your teeth too far in
We did a pretty good job so far

This game is a lot of fun, though you need to like the playstyle and genre because if you don't, you're not gonna have an experience worth your money (asymetrical, complete objectives as survivor, stop the survivors as killer). Also about money, take note that there are DLCs (and cosmetics) coming out every now and then (although you are not required to purchase the DLCs for OCs, franchise characters are only unlocked with your cash). I recommend you look up some gameplay before buying, as this game is a lot of fun, but only to the right people.
i only played it for a few its pretty decent
